name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond:
t1.`DELETED` = '0' 
	AND FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, ( SELECT BUGS FROM ZT_TESTREPORT WHERE ID = $ { srfdatacontext ( 'srfparentkey', '{"defname":"ID","dename":"ZT_TESTREPORT "}' ) } ) )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

queryCode:
SELECT
	t1.`CONFIRMED`,
	t1.`ID`,
	t1.`OPENEDBY`,
	t1.`PRI`,
	t1.`RESOLVEDBY`,
	t1.`RESOLVEDDATE`,
	t1.`STATUS`,
	t1.`TITLE` ,
	t1.BUGSN
FROM
	`zt_bug` t1
	LEFT JOIN zt_product t11 ON t1.PRODUCT = t11.ID
	LEFT JOIN zt_project t21 ON t1.PROJECT = t21.ID
	LEFT JOIN zt_story t31 ON t1.STORY = t31.ID
